Our Recruitment Process

1

Initial Consultation

Understand your specific staffing requirements and timeline

2

Candidate Selection

Rigorous vetting process to find perfect matches for your needs

3

Assessment Options

CV review, video introductions, or in-person interviews

4

Documentation

Handle all visa, work permits, and legal requirements

5

Deployment

Arrange travel and onboarding for seamless integration

6

Ongoing Support

Continuous support throughout the employment period

Flexible Assessment Options
